fields.description: A collection of various licensed attributes/limits governing use of the application
Key indicated which of a defined set of attributes the object represents.
The value at which it is recommended clients begin visibly warning end-users of impending license limitations
The value at which the license will prevent/limit use based on the associated attribute
The current level of use for the attribute
The date/time that the it is recommended clients begin visibily warning end users of the license as a whole expiring
Message representing any problems reading registration data
A collection of information on potential error states of the license
One of a defined set of keys indicating the type of error described.
User-readable description of the error
The registration ID/key associated with the application instance
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The overall validity state of the registration.
A collection of the enabled/licensed features on the application
Key indicated which of a defined set of features the object represents.
Value indicating the specific feature's licensing status.
The value at which it is recommended clients begin visibly warning end users of impending license limitations
The value at which the license will prevent/limit use of the associated feature
The date/time the license as a whole will become valid
The date/time the license as a whole will become invalid and require renewal
